about.title: About Mettyerng
about.subtitle: Our Friends Association is a private, non-profit legal entity established in 2021 by 27 founding members, operating under the motto Friendship, Solidarity, Loyalty. Our primary goal is to improve the living standards, job opportunities, and businesses of self-employed workers, technical experts, and business practitioners both domestically and internationally. We achieve this by gathering members, building a strong support network, sharing experiences, and providing training and advice.

mission.title: Mission
mission.desc1: To organize a network of friends and unite members into interest groups based on shared interests, both domestically and abroad, to foster better connections, provide support, share experiences and job market information, and offer consultation and training.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc1: To become the unified voice of Our Friends Network and the banner under which members operate, facilitating activities and building public trust.

home.ourHistoryDetail: Our Friends Association is a private association established on December 2, 2020, under the initiative of 27 founding members. The 27 founding members jointly organized and drafted the statute and internal regulations, focusing on promoting living standards, knowledge, employment opportunities, and business, which are for the benefit and social well-being of Cambodia. The association received legal registration from the Ministry of Interior through Proclamation No. 245 Prakas dated January 27, 2021, as a 'legal entity'.
home.achievementsDesc: Through various activities, Our Friends Association has provided protection and promoted living standards, as well as employment and business opportunities for self-employed individuals, technical experts, service providers, and various business operators both domestically and abroad.
home.missionDesc: To compile a network of friends and members into interest groups, both domestically and internationally, to foster better relationships, share experiences, provide job market information, and offer advice and training to improve living standards.
home.missionText: We believe that education is the most important foundation for development and building a bright future for Cambodian children and youth.
home.focusAreasDesc: Recognizing the importance of protecting and promoting living standards, employment, and business opportunities for workers, self-employed individuals, technical experts, service providers, and various business operators both domestically and abroad, Our Friends Association was established through the collective vision of a group of youth under the approach:

home.joinDesc3: Increase business opportunities, expand professional networks, and build new relationships for collective development.
home.educationDesc: A private, non-profit legal entity focused on strengthening bonds, solidarity, and a network of support among workers and businesses.
